mapper.insert: insert into expenses(e_no, m_id, e_title, e_sdate, e_edate, e_total) values(#{e_no}, #{m_id}, #{e_title}, #{e_sdate}, #{e_edate}, #{e_total})
mapper.update: update expenses set e_total = #{total} where e_no=#{e_no}
mapper.select: select course.* from (select c.c_id "c_id", c.c_name "c_name" from course c, member m where c.m_id = m.m_id AND m.M_ID = #{id} order by c_id desc)course where ROWNUM <=3
select expenses.* from (select e.e_no "e_no", e.e_title "e_title" from expenses e, member m where e.m_id = m.m_id and m.m_id = #{m_id} order by e_no desc)expenses where ROWNUM <=3

select ex.e_no "e_no", ex.e_sdate "e_sdate", ex.e_edate "e_edate", ex.e_total "e_total", ed.ed_no "ed_no", ed.ed_date "ed_date", ed.ed_kategorie "ed_kategorie", ed.ed_katename "ed_katename", ed.ed_amount "ed_amount" from expenses ex, expenses_detail ed where ex.e_no = ed.e_no and ex.e_no = #{e_no}
